scripts.pre-commit: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Backend,Frontend,Common,Changelog" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold"  "yarn --cwd backend run pre-commit"  "yarn --cwd frontend run pre-commit" "yarn --cwd common run pre-commit" "yarn run auto-changelog"
scripts.test: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd backend run backend-test"  "yarn --cwd frontend  run frontend-test" "yarn --cwd common run common-test"
scripts.dev-upgrade-dependencies: yarn upgrade --latest && yarn --cwd backend  upgrade --latest  && yarn --cwd frontend   upgrade --latest  && yarn --cwd common   upgrade --latest
scripts.dev-unlink-utils: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd backend unlink @goplan-finance/utils"  "yarn --cwd frontend  unlink @goplan-finance/utils" "yarn --cwd common unlink @goplan-finance/utils" && yarn install --force
